Body:
Description: Hello!

Customer name is PrivatBank.
After the EPP server migration with System backup v2 the logs from EPP stopped sending to their SIEM system.
The integration setting still the same, but logs are not going there.
Could you please help to investigate?
Perhaps you would need to connect to the EPP backend via ssh.

What We've Learned Updated: 24.04
- logs are not sent to the SIEM server
- asked for further details from the customer

Next Steps Updated: 24.04
- waiting on the customer

What We've Learned Updated: 24.04
- logs are not sent to the SIEM server
- asked for further details from the customer
- the new EPP server has the same IP

What We've Learned Updated: 24.04
- logs are not sent to the SIEM server
- asked for further details from the customer
- the new EPP server has the same IP

25.04
- the old server was terminated
- check connection to/from epp server
- all settings were migrated successsfuly
- set support_syslogng to 1
- tcpdump was successful
- ping and telnet were also successful
- logs started being sent to Qradar
